html:
Hi Louis,

Now that you have started sending through Postmark, we want to share some tips to maximize your deliverability and ensure all your sent emails are reliably hitting the inbox. Why is deliverability so important? Even a single email that fails to quickly reach the inbox hurts your bottom line.

DKIM and Return Path, combined with DMARC, will give you the best chances of reliably reaching the inbox. If you have not yet added DKIM and Return Path authentication to your domain, head here for some helpful instructions on verifying your domain.

Once you have successfully added DKIM and Return Path authentication for your sending domain, you are ready to set up DMARC. Be sure to check out our DMARC guide and our free DMARC reporting tool, which will generate your first DMARC record for you.

If you have any questions about getting the best deliverability results, let us know!


Dana Chaby, Patrick Graham, and Ashley Harpp
Customer Success @ Postmark

These emails are sent to help you get the most from Postmark. Not interested? Unsubscribe anytime.
text:
Hi Louis,

Now that you have started sending through Postmark, we want to share some tips to maximize your deliverability and ensure all your sent emails are reliably hitting the inbox. Why is deliverability so important? Even a single email that fails to quickly reach the inbox hurts your bottom line.

DKIM ( http://support.postmarkapp.com/article/823-what-is-dkim ) and R ( https://postmarkapp.com/support/article/910-how-do-i-add-a-custom-return-path )eturn Path ( https://postmarkapp.com/support/article/910-how-do-i-add-a-custom-return-path ), combined with DMARC ( http://support.postmarkapp.com/article/892-what-is-dmarc ), will give you the best chances of reliably reaching the
inbox. If you have not yet added DKIM and Return Path authentication to your domain, head here ( http://support.postmarkapp.com/article/1046-how-do-i-verify-a-domain ) for some helpful instructions on verifying your domain.

Once you have successfully added DKIM and Return Path authentication for your sending domain, you are ready to set up DMARC. Be sure to check out our DMARC guide ( https://postmarkapp.com/guides/dmarc ) and our free ( http://dmarc.postmarkapp.com/ )DMARC reporting t ( http://dmarc.postmarkapp.com/ )ool ( http://dmarc.postmarkapp.com/ ), which will generate your first DMARC record for you.

If you have any questions about getting the best deliverability results, let us know!

Customer Success at PostmarkDana Chaby ( https://twitter.com/msfundmc ), Patrick Graham ( https://twitter.com/prileygraham ), and Ashley Harpp ( https://twitter.com/AshHarpp11/ )
Customer Success @ Postmark ( http://postmarkapp.com )

These emails are sent to help you get the most from Postmark. Not interested? Unsubscribe ( http://track.customer.io/unsubscribe/ZO0LAAFiyW6deZR49YafoVwfgQQ= ) anytime.
